subtitle: If using wooden kebab skewers, soak them first in cold water before using.

method.text: In a large bowl, mix together the minced beef, onion, breadcrumbs and cheese. Add the egg and mix until well combined. Divide the mixture into 18 equal portions and shape into meatballs.
Roll 9 of the meatballs in sesame seeds.
Thread the meatballs alternating with the green pepper onto skewers.
Cook on barbecue for 10-15 min, turning frequently.

title: Meatball kebabs with Red Leicester cheese
